terms.label: Invalid
terms.description: Data is invalid. Do not use.

terms.label: Gap
terms.description: Gap. No data for this time period.

terms.label: Suspect
terms.description: Suspect data may be useable, but users should check it carefully. May have uncaught errors. May require modification. Read annotations.

terms.label: Curated
terms.description: Curated data has been modified and cleaned. Curated equipment are audited and calibrated at regular intervals.

terms.label: Modified
terms.description: Modified data has been cleaned or corrected.  Does not include gap filling.

terms.label: Unmanaged
terms.description: Data is not vetted. Equipment may not be audited. Use at your own risk.

terms.label: Derived
terms.description: Derived data is calculated from one or more source datasets. Datastream should have a reference to the source and the calculation used.
